Name: Frost Lag Calculation
Desc: Upon entering the Matrix, 3-Pings will give your character 60% Extra DMG for 8s. Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Scorching Flame
Desc: Each time you heal a target, your character gains 40% Fire DMG. Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Azure Star
Desc: After a blue orb ping, your character's Basic Attack gains 80% DMG for 6s. Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Uniframe
Desc: Speed Attack increases your character's DMG by 30% and reflecting increases Ice DMG by 30%. Additional triggers refresh the duration.

Name: Surging Shadow
Desc: 3-Pings will give your character 15% Dark DMG for 8s (max 4 stacks). Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Folding Blade
Desc: Each ping increases your character gains 10% CRIT Rate and 20% CRIT DMG for 3s (max 10 stacks). Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Cold Frost
Desc: Upon entering the field, the character gains 60% Basic Attack Ice DMG Bonus and 20% 3-Ping Ice DMG Bonus for 8s.

Name: Blazing Furnace
Desc: Every time upon dealing damage via Basic Attack, gains 5% Signature Move Extra DMG Bonus for 3s. Can be stacked up to 15 times. The duration will refresh whenever it is triggered.

Name: Thunderous Lightning
Desc: Upon entering the field, the character gains 50% Lightning DMG Bonus for 3s and 30% Lightning DMG Bonus for 5s after casting the Signature Move.

Name: Extreme Strike
Desc: Physical DMG by the Signature Move is guaranteed to be critical. Meanwhile, CRIT DMG Bonus increases by 200%.

Name: Shadowy Reflection
Desc: 3-Pings will cause basic attacks to deal bonus Dark damage equal to 40% of the character's ATK for 6s.

Name: Fusion Overloard
Desc: 3-Pings will give your character 45% Fire DMG for 5s (max 3 stacks). Additional triggers will refresh the duration.

Name: Quick Trick
Desc: 3-Pings will give your character 40% Physical DMG for 4s and grant 1 Red Orb.

Name: Dark Regeneration
Desc: After healing, Dark DMG of Signature Moves is increased by 30% for both the healer and the healed unit.

Name: Blazing Radiance
Desc: Basic Attack DMG increases by 15% for 8s upon a 3-Ping, stacking up to 4 times.

Name: Scarred Notion
Desc: CRIT Rate and CRIT DMG increase by 30% and 100% for 10s after triggering Matrix.

Name: Fire of Enlightenment
Desc: 3-Pings performed within 8s after the character enters the battlefield deal 50% more Fire DMG.

Name: Astral Atlas
Desc: The character deals 15% more Ice DMG after a 3-Ping. Stacks up to 4 times. Lasts 8s. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Name: Thunder Unbounded
Desc: When the character pings a Signal Orb of the same color as their last ping, they will deal 60% more Lightning DMG for 8s. Triggering this effect again will renew its duration.

Name: Electro Rage
Desc: Character gains an 80% Lightning DMG bonus for 8s every upon entering the battlefield.

Name: Valley Echos
Desc: The character gains 80% CRIT DMG dealt for 8s every time when healed. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Depths of the Sea
Desc: Every ping of the character will make them deal 25% more Dark DMG for 8s. Can be stacked up to 4 times.

Name: Fiery Blossom
Desc: The character's Fire DMG increases by 60% for 8s after every 3-Ping. Duration resets every time it is triggered.

Name: Abyss of Tabula Akasha
Desc: Ice DMG increases by 30% after a 3-Ping. Lasts 8s. Can be stacked up to 2 times. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Name: Primary Stack
Desc: Nihil DMG increases by 60% for 8s after the character casting Signature. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Name: Nightflyer's Tap
Desc: After pinging a Signal Orb, the character's CRIT DMG increases by 80% for 6s.

Name: Abrupt Blizzard
Desc: Character gains a 60% Ice DMG bonus upon entering the battlefield. The bonus decreases to 20% in 12s.

Name: Hyper Charge
Desc: The character deals 30% more Lightning DMG and 40% more Plasma Beam DMG.

Name: Blade Will
Desc: The character deals 5% more Physical DMG for each Signal Orb pinged, stacking up to 8 times and lasting for 8s. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered. The character Ultima deals 40% more damage through Ultima Slash.

Name: Thunderclap
Desc: The character deals 20% more Fire DMG for 8s every after a 3-Ping. This effect can stack up to 3 times. Duration resets every time the effect is triggered.

Name: Hyper Charge
Desc: The character deals 30% more Lightning DMG and 40% more Plasma Beam DMG. Meanwhile, gains 1 Red Orb every time when activating the Plasma Beam.

Name: Electro Overflow
Desc: After casting a Signal Orb skill, Lightning DMG of the character increases by 20% for 8s, stacking up to 3 times. Duration resets every time it is triggered.
